<script type="text/template" id="autosuggest-link-template">

<script id="recirc-module-template" type="text/template">
	<div class="recirculation-module">
		<div class="recirculation-module-header">
			More From

			<a class="recirculation-module-feed-link" href="<%= data.feed.url %>"><%= data.feed.title %></a>
		</div>

		<div class="recirculation-module-inner">
			<% _.each( data.content, function( item, index ) { %>
				<div class="simple-item recirculation-module-item">
					<a
						href="<%= item.url %>"
						data-ga-ux-element="Right Rail"
						data-ga-call-to-action="<%= _.escape(item.title) %>"
						data-ga-position="<%= index + 1 %>"
						data-ga-total-positions="<%= data.content.length %>"
					>
						<div class="recirculation-module-image">
							<% if ( item.image ) { %>
								<div class="full-item-image item-image recirculation-image">
									
<img class="lazyload lazyload-in-view" data-src="<%= item.image.src %>"
	<% if ( typeof item.image.srcset !== "undefined" && item.image.srcset.length ) { %>
		data-srcset="<%= item.image.srcset.join(",") %>"
	<% } %>
/>


									<%
	var displayTypeTitle = item.displaytype._attributes.title;
	var contentTypeTitle = item.contenttype._attributes.title;

	var contentTypeIcon = {
		"Quizzes": "quiz",
		"Video": "video"
	}[ contentTypeTitle ];

	var displayTypeIcon = {
		"Gallery": "gallery"
	}[ displayTypeTitle ];

	var acceptedContentTypes = contentTypeTitle === "Quizzes" || contentTypeTitle === "Video";
	var acceptedDisplayTypes = displayTypeTitle === "Gallery";

	var showIcons = acceptedContentTypes || acceptedDisplayTypes;
%>

<% if ( showIcons ) { %>
	<div class="content-type-icon">
		<i class="icon icon-<% if ( contentTypeIcon ) { %><%= contentTypeIcon %><% } else { %><%= displayTypeIcon %><% } %>"></i>
	</div>
<% } %>

								</div>
							<% } else { %>
								<div class="recirculation-content-indicator">
									<% if ( item && item.hasOwnProperty( "displayType" ) ) { %>
	<%
		var iconClass = {
			"Gallery": "gallery",
			"Listicle": "list",
			"Long Form Article": "feature"
		}[ item.displayType ] || "article";
	%>
	<span class="content-indicator  icon icon-<%= iconClass %>"></span>
<% } %>

								</div>
							<% } %>
						</div>

						<span class="item-title recirculation-module-item-title"><%= item.title %></span>
					</a>

					<% if ( item.sponsor ) { %>
							

<%
	var sponsorClass = {
		"1": "no-logo",
		"2": "presented-by",
		"3": "brand-logo",
		"4": "provided-by",
		"5": "created-for",
		"6": "custom-label"
	}[ item.sponsor.type ],
	siteName = item.sitename,
	customLabelLong = item.sponsor.custom_label_long,
	customLabelShort = item.sponsor.custom_label_short;
%>

<% if ( sponsorClass != "no-logo" ) { %>
	<div class="sponsor sponsor-inline simple-item-sponsor recirculation-sponsor <%= sponsorClass %>">
		<div class="sponsor-label">
			<% if ( sponsorClass === "brand-logo" ) { %>
					<span class="site-name"><%= siteName %></span>
			<% } else if ( sponsorClass === "created-for" ) { %>
				<span class="created-for--short" >
					Created for
				</span>

				<span class="created-for--long" >
					Created by <%= siteName %> for
				</span>
			<% } else if ( sponsorClass === "custom-label" ) { %>
				<span class="custom-label--short" >
					<%= customLabelShort %>
				</span>

				<span class="custom-label--long" >
					<%= customLabelLong %>
				</span>
			<% } else { %>
				<% if ( sponsorClass === "presented-by" ) { %>
					Presented by
				<% } %>

				<% if ( sponsorClass === "provided-by" ) { %>
					Created by
				<% } %>
			<% } %>
		</div>
		<% if ( sponsorClass === "brand-logo" ) { %>
			<span class="sponsor-logo-separator">+ </span>
		<% } %>
		<div class="sponsor-image">
			<%= item.sponsor.brand %>
		</div>
	</div>
<% } %>

					<% } %>
				</div>
			<% } ); %>
		</div>
	</div>
</script>
<script id="related-module-template" type="text/template">
	<a class="related-content-link" href="<%= data.url %>">
		<div class="embed-related-content" data-related-id="<%= data.id %>" data-tracking-id="recirc-editorial" data-tracking-label="<%= data.title %>">
			<div class="image-container aspect-ratio-2x1">
				<% if ( data.image ) { %>
					
<img class="lazyload lazyload-in-view" data-src="<%= data.image.src %>"
	<% if ( typeof data.image.srcset !== "undefined" && data.image.srcset.length ) { %>
		data-srcset="<%= data.image.srcset.join(",") %>"
	<% } %>
/>

				<% } else { %>
					<% if ( item && item.hasOwnProperty( "displayType" ) ) { %>
	<%
		var iconClass = {
			"Gallery": "gallery",
			"Listicle": "list",
			"Long Form Article": "feature"
		}[ item.displayType ] || "article";
	%>
	<span class="content-indicator  icon icon-<%= iconClass %>"></span>
<% } %>

				<% } %>
			</div>
			<div class="info-container">
				<a class="item-title recirculation-module-item-title" href="<%= data.url %>"><%= data.title %></a>
			</div>
		</div>
	</a>
</script>
<script id="content-testing-template" type="text/template">
	<div class="ct-unit">
		<div class="ct-unit-inner">
			<div class="ct-unit-text-container">
				<a class="ct-unit-heading" href="<%= body.variant_url %>">Read This Next</a>

				<a class="ct-unit-title" href="<%= body.variant_url %>"><%= body.headline %></a>
			</div>

			<a class="ct-unit-image-container" href="<%= body.variant_url %>">
				
<img class="ct-unit-image lazyload lazyload-in-view" data-src="<%= body.image.selectedCrop %>"
	<% if ( typeof srcset !== "undefined" && srcset.length ) { %>
		data-srcset="<%= srcset.join(",") %>"
	<% } %>
/>

			</a>
		</div>
	</div>
</script>
<script id="gallery-module-template" type="text/template">
	<div class="gallery-module" data-gallery-id="<%= galleryId %>" data-gallery-slide-count="<%= data.length %>">
		<% if ( !gallerySuppressTitle ) { %>
			<h2 class="title"><%= title %></h2>
		<% } %>
		<div class="gallery-slide">
			<div class="slides">
				<ul class="actions">
					<li class="previous"></li>
					<li class="next"></li>
				</ul>
				<div class="slides-inner">
					<% _.each( data, function( item, i ) { %>
						<div class="slide">
							<figure>
								<% if ( item.data.type == 'image' ) { %>
									<div class="image">
										<img data-src="<%= item.data.media.src %>" data-srcset="
											<% _.each( item.data.media.srcset, function( srcset, i ) { %>
												<%= srcset.img %><% if (i !== item.data.media.srcset.length ) { %>, <% } %>
											<% }); %>
										">
									</div>
								<% } else if ( item.data.type == 'file' ) { %>
									<div class="loop">
										<video data-src="<%= item.data.src %>" autoplay loop muted playsinline></video>
									</div>
								<% } else if ( item.data.type == 'video' ) { %>
									<div class="video">
										<iframe src="<%= item.data.src %>"></iframe>
									</div>
								<% } else if ( item.data.type == 'embed' && item.data.media.embed_type == 'youtube' ) { %>
									<div class="youtube">
										<%= item.data.media.lazy_embed_code %>
									</div>
								<% } %>
								<figcaption>
									<% if (data.length > lowSlideCount) { %>
										<p class="index"><%= i + 1 %><span class="index-text">of</span><%= data.length %></p>
									<% } %>
									<% if ( item.data.headline ) { %>
										<p class="headline"><%= item.data.headline %></p>
									<% } %>
									<% if ( item.data.dek ) { %>
										<%= item.data.dek.replace(/<img(.*?)>/g, '').replace(/<p>/g, '<p class="dek">') %>
									<% } %>
									<% if ( item.data.credit ) { %>
										<p class="credit"><%= item.data.credit %></p>
									<% } %>
									<% if ( item.data.copyright ) { %>
										<p class="copyright"><%= item.data.copyright %></p>
									<% } %>
								</figcaption>
							</figure>
						</div>
					<% }); %>
				</div>
			</div>
			<% if (data.length <= lowSlideCount) { %>
				<div class="dots">
					<% _.each( data, function( item, i ) { %>
						<div class="dot<% if (i === 0) { %> active<% } %>"><%= i + 1 %></div>
					<% }); %>
				</div>
			<% } %>
			<div class="caption"></div>
		</div>
		<% if (data.length > lowSlideCount) { %>
			<div class="thumbnails">
				<ul class="actions">
					<li class="previous"></li>
					<li class="next"></li>
				</ul>
